description: The third major power within the http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance]. Along with the http://anidb.net/ch1594 [Atlantic Federation] and http://anidb.net/ch1595 [Eurasian Federation], the Republic of East Asia was one of the primary sponsors of the http://anidb.net/ch1571 [PLANT] construction project. Though its political influence is no match for that of the Alliance`s leading powers, its large population gives it a high industrial production capacity. Originally made up of the modern-day nations of China, Japan, and Korea, the Republic of East Asia encompasses much of the Asian region.
name: Republic of East Asia
